website_summaries.verdict: No need to waste the space on your shower or tub door: use it to organize your toiletries.
pros: Two shallow shelves hold small bottles of shampoo or other shower essentials
Suction cups keep the organizer from sliding
cons: Only suitable for showers or tubs with sliding glass doors

customer_reviews.title: Best shower caddy I've owned to date
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is well made and sturdy. I love that it can hang it along the shower wall/door and not over the head. Provides more space that way too. The suction cups give extra security and over hang hooks are padded. The hooks were turned opposite when I received, but nothing a screwdriver couldn't fix. I guess they have it that way so it lays properly in the box. Holds everything need.
customer_reviews.author: SariphineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups are useless
customer_reviews.text: The rack itself seems well-made and sturdy, but the included suction cups are garbage. They're thin, flimsy, and almost completely flat. I have several other suction-cup things in my shower, and this is the only one that won't stay put. This is only really a problem if you're using it in the towel-rack configuration (with the hooks facing forward) because it'll tend to pull away from the wall, but it's such an idiotic cost-saving measure that I can't rate it any higher than a 2/5.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Sergei Purne

customer_reviews.title: Fits liter shampoo bottles with pumps!
customer_reviews.text: I have searched forever for a caddy for our glass shower. I ordered 2 if these. T It dies fit a 1 liter shampoo. As a hairdresser thats super important because I never buy the small bottles! The liter bottles only fit on the top shelf. I have had no issues eith them falling out or being wobbly inside the shelf. Its a great design!
customer_reviews.author: Jami Young

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Things Organized
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and setup of this caddy. Fits larger soaps and has a good structure to accommodate a lot of items. Item feels sturdy and doesn't move once suctioned to the glass wall. Once issue is that there was a small paint chip on the back. After a long time in the shower, I noticed it developed a little rust were the chip was. I sanded away the rust and covered up the area with a little rustoleum and the rust hasn't returned.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: RUSTED - One Month
customer_reviews.text: This is a really bad product and it started rusting ONE month after purchase at the weld points and top screws and then on the surface. The pictures attached is over a 4 year usage but still the point is that it starts to rust immediately. We live in a dry climate!
customer_reviews.author: Motch6

customer_reviews.title: seems simple but very well made and designed.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, well made, plenty of room, great design. Very happy. The dual design for the hooks to handle razors is a nice touch as is the bar they are attached to for hanging a cloth. The shelves are pretty deep and allow plenty of room for bottles of any and every size and there is enough room between the shelves to allow for large bottles to be used in the lower. The suction cups keep the caddy from shifting, moving, and rattling. It stays firmly positioned wherever you put it.
customer_reviews.author: sa418

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The appearance is actually very nice. Extremely sturdy, and it stays in place without shifting. I gave it three stars because one of the main vertical pieces that holds everything together was bent. I had to try to rebend it back into it's original shape. Came close, but no cigar! I kept it because it's a real hassle returning anything. I'm honestly devided. It's such a good product, but because it was damaged it feels less than new.
customer_reviews.author: Tom DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Good for showers that have very little shelving
customer_reviews.text: One of the small hooks was bent but was an easy fix to just bend it back. The top hooks just need to be unscrewed to be adjusted (make sure to use a large enough screw driver as the metal seems to be very strip prone. All in all a perfect caddy for any shower that has the spot to accommodate it. I have a standing shower that has a bare glass wall with metal framing open to the outside and has little shelving for more than two bottles so this caddy was just what I needed. I would not recommend this for sliding shower doors (design seems wrong for that!)
customer_reviews.author: Senn

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and workmanship. Immediate return.
customer_reviews.text: The over the shower door hanger was a mess. The hanger width is for a room door not a shower door so the unit hangs at an angle and looks sloppy. Also the screws for the hanger were not tight. Poor workmanship and poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I needed! I have one of those showers that is enclosed by a glass wall, and it only comes with one measly little built-in corner shelf that is about 4 square inches. That is just barely enough for what I have, but when I got a roommate it was not enough for both of our shower products. This was a great value, fits perfectly where I needed it to be, and stays put really well.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Huffman

customer_reviews.title: FITS THE BILL FOR ME!!
customer_reviews.text: I RECENTLY HAD THE (SOMEWHAT) UNFORTUNATE OPPORTUNITY TO MOVE INTO A HOME BUILT IN THE EARLY 1980"S. EVERY SINGLE FEATURE REMAINS, WHICH MAKES IT RIPE FOR A 'FLIP', BUT THAT WILL ENTAIL GUTTING IT AND I CANNOT ACCOMPLISH THAT IN ONE FELL SWOOP. THEREFORE, I AM RELEGATED TO USING SLIDING GLASS TUB/SHOWER DOORS, WITH VERY LIMITED SPACE FOR BATHING ESSENTIALS. THIS PRODUCT HAS BEEN A GODSEND. I LOOKED FAR AND WIDE FOR SOMETHING THAT WOULD NOT RESTRICT MY ALREADY SMALL SPACE. THIS IS STURDY, IMMOVABLE (AS LONG AS YOU REMEMBER THAT YOU ARE USING ONE DOOR ONLY AS A SLIDER) AND HAS ADEQUATE SPACE TO ACCOMMODATE MY NEEDS. GREAT PRICE TO BOOT.
customer_reviews.author: CK WOOD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at all
customer_reviews.text: The nails holding the basket to the bars are all rusted. I haven't had this for a year yet. It's in the back of my shower so it's not even under running water. Horrible. Also the suction cups are not long enough to go against my wall when attached to a bar.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: The suction is not ideal if you aren’t using the hook I would look for something else also it’s a bit cheaply made but over all good for a second bath not for master or guest
customer_reviews.author: Amber English

customer_reviews.title: Pretty careless of the assembler
customer_reviews.text: Hooks are on backwards, as in other reviews, making this caddy useless to me. I attempted to unscrew the hooks to move them around (which I resent having to do in the first place) but they are stuck tight and I nearly stripped one of the screws. If my husband can't fix this it will be garbage and I will need to return it. Ridiculous oversight by the company that made this.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Bartell

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied! Wish I found this product sooner!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Big enough to hold liter size bottles & it's strong enough to be able to hold quite a bit and maintain the pressure if you decide to use pumps. I also have to say I was a bit thrown when I saw the price being so cheap but don't be alarmed it is a quality product that is much sturdier than others I have purchased in the past for upwards of $60-$70.
customer_reviews.author: Bichenbrunette

customer_reviews.title: The caddy itself is not good quality. The wire hooks at the bottom are ...
customer_reviews.text: The caddy arrived well boxed with no external damage to the box, but the finish on the caddy was marred and scratched. Based on these facts, it appears that the caddy was damaged from the start and shipped anyway. The caddy itself is not good quality. The wire hooks at the bottom are thin and arrived a bit bent. Not the quality we are use to from local stores. I only bought this one online because the local stores do not stock much in the way of over the door style caddies. I do not recommend this product and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: Great for shower bar
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shower storage. I was looking for something to put on the awkward towel bar that's on the back wall of my shower. I came across this and decided to try it out. Looks great on the wall and holds a ton of bottles. Haven't had it too long so unsure of how it will hold up in regards to rusting. So far it meets all my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Kell

customer_reviews.title: Good shower caddy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchases the satin finish, and it looks like some type of chrome so hopefully it will not rust. I got this to hang over my shower door. The metal pieces that actually hang over the door came on the wrong side, but I did as one previous feedback person said and was able to just move them with my hands so it would correctly fit over my shower door. And they were a little too large, so again I did as one person suggested and pressed them out to the right, and now it is a snug fit. Very happy with this so far!
customer_reviews.author: supermom

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and is a great option for shower items that ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and is a great option for shower items that doesn't have to go over the spout and ruin the shower head. The only thing I would like better is if it was just a little longer and there was a better place to put a bar of soap. My husband uses the top shelf - I definitely can't reach anything with a pump from that shelf. Our shower is about 7 or 7 1/2 feet high - pretty average height for a glass surround shower so that the water doesn't splash over the top, that's why I say the arms could be a few inches longer. This one looks "neater" than others we have used.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cones

customer_reviews.title: To big for a small corner shower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fit over a 3' x 3' corner shower glass enclosure. I really had to manipulate to arms to get it over the glass, so make sure you have at least a 3" clearance between the enclosure and ceiling. When I finally DID get it on, I found that I simply did not have enough room in this small shower for it! It looks very well made, and I like the concept. If you have a larger shower, this would be ideal, but if your shower is small - you might look for something else. (I'm still looking!)
customer_reviews.author: Keithziemba

customer_reviews.title: Measure your bottles
customer_reviews.text: My taller bottles of shampoo do not fit in the lower rack. I should have thought about that, but didn’t! Looks great though and the suction holds it in place perfectly. Wish the hooks underneath were a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: My favorite accessory in the shower
customer_reviews.text: Okay I LOVE this shower holder! I love the fact that it goes over the door rather than just using the suction cups, it actually holds in place and can support a bigger mass load. Its spacious and I can fit my bigger size shampoo bottles in no problem! (would be cool to have something for your toothbrush as well). The razor blade holder works good too, my wife likes that feature a lot. Great product for great price! strongly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: ItsJustBlah

customer_reviews.title: Great for the camper.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my camper and it works perfect. The only think I didnt like was the wiggle room at the top. It needs a foam piece on top to stop the movement. I put some felt on it and it helped. Otherwise it was a great deal and works well. It holds exactly what we need and keeps me from having to remove our bath items each time we move the camper.
customer_reviews.author: rodsgrl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Usually don’t take the time to review a product, but this one is worth it! There are no shelves in our master shower stall. This shower rack fits perfectly on the side wall. It stays in place and we were pleasantly surprised by how much it holds. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: allyrose

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. I have one that I put in the kids bathroom and it hangs from a towel bar in the shower. It's perfect for their bathroom. Unfortunately our walk in shower frame is a bit wide so we can't hang it from there but we do hang it from the towel bar on the sliding door and it works. We just have to open door slowly. Our shower feels larger with everything off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: jadegirl398

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item.
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out perfectly for our small shower. It has plenty of space for several items on shelves and hanging. Hubby is pleased with the organized look and I'm happy the built in shower seat is completely cleaned off and available for its intended use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great design.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to hang in our shower that would not interfere with the removable shower head and this fit the bill. I was also concerned about something that would rust. Hopefully there won't be any issues. My husband commented that it was cool (that's definitely a compliment because he doesn't really care about such things)!
customer_reviews.author: Safyre Spitfire

customer_reviews.title: A great contender for shower caddies that cost twice as much.
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than the old shower head hanging caddy. Its made exceptionally well. The only feature I wish it had was a height adjustment built in. Just to be able to lower it a few inches would make it perfect. I could always get some longer screws and lengthen how the hooks attach but you can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Xandar the Destroyer

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to house my shampoos and a large body wash on the top shelf and other stuff on the bottom. I have it hanging on the outside of the shower until we finish painting. Overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Williams

customer_reviews.title: It has more than enough room and is so sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: It has more than enough room! I use it to hold large size shampoo and conditioner bottles along with liquid body washes. It is sturdy and does not move. It will drain and stay cleaner than the plastic trays I did have. I like the hooks for shavers & body brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex L. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: which is awesome if you're looking for something to store big shampoo ...
customer_reviews.text: This shower caddy is huge, which is awesome if you're looking for something to store big shampoo bottles and stuff. What I didn't like about this is that the back of the baskets are completely open. If you're using this on a door that swings open, things will probably fall out as you open/close the door. It definitely can't be used over a shower rod with a curtain, which is what I was looking for, so I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Buy me
customer_reviews.text: We have a sloped shower head so most overhanging shower caddies would slide off. This fit great over the glass in our shower and fits plenty of bottles for me and my wife (she still needs more space, but that's another story). Also, her oddly shaped razors fit well on the hooks, as did hanging a washcloth and loofa.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy one of these products online without knowing what the finish would be, but am very pleased with it. The silver color looks great and the build of the unit is quite sturdy. I wish the unit would actually be longer, as I cannot fit any bottles with dispensers on the bottom shelf, and the top shelf can be a bit of a reach, depending on the height of your shower door.
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is meeting our needs very well. We hung over in-shower towel bar. Only problem is that suction cups will not stick to tiles, which allows shelf to swing away from wall and items fall out. We solved problem by stretching small bungee cords at intervals across back. Otherwise would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy holder
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandma. It has good suction to the glass, and it’s very sturdy to hold heavy bottles of shampoo and such. I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Plante

customer_reviews.title: not for children
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my walk in shower. I absolutely love it! only complaint I have is I use the shampoo and conditioners with the pump, and they are too high to fit in the bottom basket so I have to put them in the top. Good for adults, but maybe not for children to use. I love the hooks I hook y sponge and razors on them. Very convenient, durable, does not move.
customer_reviews.author: NCleidomastoid

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Caddy!
customer_reviews.text: Great shower caddy for the price! You can't beat it. Lots of room for all your soaps and shampoos, hooks on the bottom and it suctions to the wall/door of your shower so it doesn't move or tip when you are reaching for a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our needs. We bought a condo and the shower didn’t have anywhere to store shampoo etc. It did have an old style towel bar though. I had to turn the hooks around which was no big deal and the suction cups keep it in place. It holds plenty of products and I love that I can hang my pouffe!
customer_reviews.author: Ritajo

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, solid, and stable
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hanging over my shower enclosure for two months and it's exactly what I needed. It's good looking, solidly constructed, and very stable--it doesn't shift at all, even though the hanging brackets are much wider than my enclosure panel. It holds a lot, including two large pump shampoo bottles on the top shelf. No signs of rust or discoloration. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RPB

customer_reviews.title: very bad design
customer_reviews.text: it's a very bad design. the hanger parts are too big and they move around! it has no back part will make thing fall off easily!!!
customer_reviews.author: FIGS

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Only wish there was more space between the shelves to accommodate taller bottles.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: its worth searching for better suction cups
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups don't adhere well, they are semi-warped. So they stick for 5 sec and then pull back to their warped shape. However, for the price and the fact that it is primarly supported by the door hooks, its worth searching for better suction cups. Just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Repko

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these for Mr. And Mrs. And we love them! They hold all my products and my husbands accessories work great with it. All the right shelving and hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 98% rust proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because it is supposed to be rust proof. The actual caddy is. The screws they use to hold the hooks at the top are not and have completely rusted after a couple of weeks in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! I have been looking and tried several ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! I have been looking and tried several shower caddy all of them broke within a couple months. When I found this and read the reviews I knew I had to try it. I was worried that the hook wouldn't fit my 2 inch wide door, but it fit perfectly. This shower caddy is very sturdy and hasn't moved since I the first day I hung it. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Over the door shower racks are hard to find, and when you do come across one it's usually only one. There's not much of a selection. This replaced a rack that was rusting. Fits perfect, plenty of space for my wife and I, looks good, and looks like it may last a long while. I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MaxDog MD

customer_reviews.title: Shower caddy
customer_reviews.text: Love these shower caddy’s. They look great in my newly remodeled bathroom on my glass wall.
customer_reviews.author: B. Akers

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I needed for our shower. I have the large pump shampoos and they fit perfectly on the top shelf (it didn't fit on the bottom) and I was able to fit my conditioner, shampoo and body wash in ones shelf and they are all the large pump kind. Now I don't have to have everything on the floor of the shower anymore.
customer_reviews.author: A Little Charmed Home

customer_reviews.title: Good for space limited bath areas.
customer_reviews.text: Good for space limited bath areas. I can fit almost all height of shampoos. The only ones that may not fit are the giant tall family size pump shampoos. Other than that, everything fits.
customer_reviews.author: Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Not a tight fit
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are non adjustable. So, the I had to plug in something between the door and the hooks to make it tight fit. And, now the install looks ugly. Otherwise the product is good. I wish I had an option to make the hooks behave better.
customer_reviews.author: Jpt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this product. Great price that solved the issue I was having perfectly (not having enough shelving within the shower). Hung over our stationary glass door without issue and has not dropped or caused any items within the basket to drop either. The hooks could possibly be made a little smaller, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: poopshakes

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to shower!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our shower! We've been using this for awhile now and am extremely pleased!! The pieces that go over the top of our shower doors are a little wide -- but the rack is still very stable hanging there (maybe because of the suction cups?). Love the spacing of the shelves too.
customer_reviews.author: moviegoer524

customer_reviews.title: SHOWER ORGANIZER
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS GOOD FOR ORGANIIZING SHOWER ITEMS LIKE SOAP, SHAMPOO AND COND. AND OTHER SOWER TOOLS YOU MIGHT HAVE.
customer_reviews.author: SLD

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of room for storage
customer_reviews.text: This bathroom organizer is perfect for storage. All of our stuff fits in this organizer. The suction works well, and the top part fits well over the shower doors.
customer_reviews.author: Candida

customer_reviews.title: Best bathroom purchase I ever made
customer_reviews.text: If your shower has a glass wall that you can hang this on, then you need to buy this! Best bathroom purchase I have ever made. Super sturdy, fits tons of stuff, and works WAY better than those caddy's that go over the shower head.
customer_reviews.author: ZPO

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It is very sturdy and high enough to hold the large bottles of shampoo. Plenty of room for my husband and myself. The suction cups work well, hold the shower shelf in place perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It works, but less than a month in, it's already starting to rust in several places. I may just spray it with some rustoleum to make it last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L.

customer_reviews.title: Better than i thought
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I have only had it for about 3 weeks but was very impressed with quality. It was big enough for all my stuff. I did not think it would all fit. Even though it was big enough to fit all my stuff it doesn't look bulky. happy with my purchase . I am not sure if it will rust as of now but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Rossana

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my application
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my application. I needed the hangers to rotate 180 degrees, which is easy to do with this unit. Just loosen the screws, rotate, and re-tighten the screws.
customer_reviews.author: peyitoyoco

customer_reviews.title: fianlly a shower caddy that fits over the shower door and stays in place!
customer_reviews.text: No more items on the shower floor. This shower caddy is very well made, it stays in place and it holds all the items I had previously stored on the shower floor
customer_reviews.author: NKWPRH

customer_reviews.title: Great shower caddy
customer_reviews.text: I Really like this shower caddy. It is very sturdy and fits very well in our shower. We did have to adjust the handle clips which were extremely tight, but now fits perfectly. It is just the right size and holds all our shower products. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Janny

customer_reviews.title: Good solution
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the one we had hanging on the shower head. Too much weight that way. This a safer solution.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: We turned the hooks around and hung it on the towel rack inside the shower. It works wonderfully! Everything fits nicely, and I love that I can hang up my razor.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: Did not last.
customer_reviews.text: This caddy looked nice for about a year. Over time, the coating cracked and the wire underneath rusted making it look ugly. I expected it to last longer. This one did not last as long as the cheap, white, over the shower caddy that we used for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Lee B

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Caddy
customer_reviews.text: I have been through several shower caddy's and this has been my favorite. I've had it for a couple of months, and so far so good!!! It holds everything we need, and has little hooks for our loofah's at the bottom. No rust as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: C. Czeck

customer_reviews.title: seems like good quality material
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my shower... seems like good quality material, so lets hope it is truely "rust-proof". I bought this one after being disappointed with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tomlson

customer_reviews.title: The hooks aren’t deep enough to actually fit over the ...
customer_reviews.text: The hooks aren’t deep enough to actually fit over the “rail” of the sliding glass door for my shower, which was the reason I bought this caddy. I hadn’t used this style before and won’t again. Next time I’ll just get something that loops over the shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended and looks nice. 4 stars because my personal preference, now that I have it, would've been a flat surface on the shelves rather than the grated surface which causes some items to tip over and fall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy -- Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months now and I love it. I keep it out of the way of the running water and I haven't noticed any signs of rusting yet. I don't use the suction cups, but the whole thing has been very sturdy so far -- I haven't had any problems with it falling or moving at all. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Olivos Family

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a rock
customer_reviews.text: Rack arrived on time and is a really solid rack.Holds plenty of bottles and has hooks for robe or towels. Rack does not tip from side to side as has supports on both sides and not in the middle.Would buy again and recommend for a great shower caddy.
customer_reviews.author: J.Blook

customer_reviews.title: Just check the width of bar holding top of shower doors.
customer_reviews.text: Hangers were a little small for my shower doors. Also interefered with opening doors. Took off suction cups and works better. Shelves were good size for holding economy size shampoo, body wash etc and has handy hooks to hold items.
customer_reviews.author: Stickmom

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Do yourself a favor and order this! I have had so much hassle with finding something to hold bigger bottles and to actually stay up!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Bought this after I moved and no longer had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after I moved and no longer had a shower head that was reachable without stretching to hang a caddy over. This one hangs on one of the glass walls and suction cups on for extra security. Has enough space for all my shower stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Really good, looks exactly like the picture. However I don't have glass doors to hang it over, rather I hung it over the towel rack inside the bathtub. The heads rotate so that is awesome, too.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: ... and most of these don't fit so we were happy to find this
customer_reviews.text: our sliding door has a top rail and most of these don't fit so we were happy to find this! it came really quickly as well
customer_reviews.author: kpierce

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in the glass shower and has plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in the glass shower and has plenty of space for all my shower products. The hooks at the bottom are a bit of an awkward angle and sometimes my razors fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation.  Works
customer_reviews.text: Does just what it is designed to do. Holds heavy bottles with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Two degrees off

customer_reviews.title: Does not rust

customer_reviews.title: Fits the space perfect in our shower
customer_reviews.text: Fits the space perfect in our shower. Several have complained about the hooks being turned the wrong way. It was done for shipping purposes so it would lie flat in the box. You merely only have to get your handy Phillips screw driver, loosen the screws, turn the hooks, and tighten the screws. It is very nice looking.

product_meta.title: iDesign Forma Bathroom Over the Door Shower Caddy with Storage Baskets Shelves for Shampoo, Conditioner, Soap, Set of 1, Satin Silver
product_meta.description: Size:Set of 1Organize your shower with the iDesign Forma Shower Caddy! This large hanging caddy is placed over the door or wall of your shower for additional storage. The rust-resistant satin silver finish adds a classic look and will stay looking new for years of quality use. Designed with lower hooks, you can easily hold multiple razors, loofahs, and washcloths, allowing them to dry off between showers. The metal wire baskets allow for water drainage while storing your shampoos, soap, and other bath items. Strong suction cups on the bottom of the caddy firmly stick to the wall, assuring that your items stay in place. Measuring 12" x 6.5" x 24", you are sure to have space for all of your bath time necessities in the iDesign Forma Shower Caddy.
feature_bullets: VERSATILE BATH STORAGE: Compact shower caddy has 2 storage basket to fit tall bottles, 3 lower hooks can hold large bath towels or robes outside of the shower
EASY TO INSTALL: Simply place over shower doors up to 1.75" thick - No tools required. Foam backing prevents scratches on your glass shower door
STRONG HOLD: Two rear suction cups keep the caddy firmly in place
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Steel wire construction is coated with a rust-resistant coating and features an attractive satin silver finish
SPACE-EFFICIENT: Each caddy measures 12" x 6.5" x 24" to fit in compact spaces
